actions.name: Magnet Pull (Terrain)
actions.description: Effect: If a space within range possesses Electric Terrain, the user is affected by Electric Terrain.

actions.name: Magnet Pull
actions.description: Effect: Steel-Type creatures in range are @Affliction[stuck], @Affliction[slowed], @Affliction[stunted], and @Affliction[hindered].

system.description: Effect: Steel-Type creatures in range are @Affliction[stuck], @Affliction[slowed], @Affliction[stunted], and @Affliction[hindered]. If a space within range possesses Electric Terrain, the user is affected by Electric Terrain.
